reviews.review_msg: Uses group work as a reason not to teach. Assignments are generally meaningless but nonetheless extremely time consuming. Ushamedly plays favourites. Spineless students sit back while she pours out her disdain on the evil colonialists who pay her salary. A really sad person. Avoid.

This woman makes group work something to dread.  There's so much of it that you wonder if there's a point doing the readings or taking notes.  Gives great insights to assist in your assignment but otherwise you're left thinking the course doesn't do much for you.  Otherwise, she tries.
